pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Yabridge is a modern and transparent way to use Windows VST2, VST3, and CLAP audio plugins on Linux. It seamlessly supports both 32-bit and 64-bit Windows plugins in 64-bit Linux plugin hosts as if they were native plugins.
Yabridge uses Wine to run Windows plugins and features a concurrent architecture with a focus on transparency, allowing it to be both fast and highly compatible while staying easy to debug and maintain. It supports plugin groups for VST2 plugins to enable inter-plugin communication and quick startup times.
The package includes yabridgectl, a companion utility that manages yabridge installations and automatically sets up bridged plugins.

use.flag: Build 32-bit plugin host to support legacy 32-bit Windows plugins in 64-bit Linux hosts
